TABLE.NAME: assignprogram
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about an instance of mod_assignprogram in a course.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the instance of the assignment. Displayed at the top of each page.

FIELD.NAME: externalname
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the assignment in the external system

FIELD.NAME: externallink
FIELD.COMMENT: The link to the assignment in the external system

FIELD.NAME: alwaysshowlink
FIELD.COMMENT: If false the external link will only be displayed after the allowsubmissionsfrom date. If true it will always be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The description of the assignment. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field of the assignment. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: alwaysshowdescription
FIELD.COMMENT: If false the assignment intro will only be displayed after the allowsubmissionsfrom date. If true it will always be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: alwaysshowassignment
FIELD.COMMENT: If false the link to the external assignment will only be displayed after the allowsubmissionsfrom date. If true it will always be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: The due date for the assignment. Displayed to students.

FIELD.NAME: allowsubmissionsfromdate
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, submissions will only be accepted after this date.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the settings for this assign module instance were last modified.

FIELD.NAME: cutoffdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The final date after which submissions will no longer be accepted for this assignment without an extensions.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum grade for this assignment.

FIELD.NAME: passingpercentage
FIELD.COMMENT: What percentage of the maximum grade must be achieved to pass.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this assignment instance.

INDEX.NAME: course
INDEX.COMMENT: The course this assignment instance belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: gradeexternal
FIELD.COMMENT: The numerical grade from the external system for this assignment submission.

FIELD.NAME: feedbackexternal
FIELD.COMMENT: The feedback from the external system in html-form.

FIELD.NAME: grademanual
FIELD.COMMENT: The manual numerical grade for this assignment submission.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this grade.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment instance this grade belongs to.

INDEX.NAME: userid
INDEX.COMMENT: The userid for the submission relating to this grade.

INDEX.NAME: assignment
INDEX.COMMENT: The assignment for the submission relating to this grade.
